pages.text: This spell mimics the $(marked)Evoker$()'s Vex summoning attack in its primal form. The so-called $(marked)Harrows$() summoned by this spell will target whatever their summoner is targeting, for as long as they are able to exist.
Learning this spell effect requires $(ml:world/occult_knowledge)Evoker Gossip$(). It also requires minor ascension progress.
